name: Playful Interaction #3: Adaptation
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to shoot (when gun is equipped)

This is an adaptation of the "Pitch Black/Night Vision" scene from The Silence of the Lambs (1991). You play as Clarice Starling but see the world from Buffalo Bill's perspective with his night vision goggles, just like in the movie. You have limited vision (as did Clarice) and you're supposed to hide from Bill as he searches for you, and look for the gun to shoot him and end the game.
